resources.string: Order Delivered\\nOrder delivered! Enjoy your meal and don’t forget to rate your experience.
Order Confirmation\\nYour order has been placed successfully! Sit tight while we prepare your food.
Order Accepted\\nGood news! The restaurant has accepted your order and is getting it ready.
Food Being Prepared\\nYour meal is being freshly prepared. We’ll notify you once it’s on the way!
